step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare for the movement.
As you stretch your arms overhead, ensure your fingers are spread wide. Focus on reaching up.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent! As you stretch your arms back overhead, focus on a full exhale and relaxing your muscles.
You completed the first repetition well. Ensure you are fully extending your arms overhead.
Second rep starting strong. Maintain a comfortable posture and prepare to move your arms.
Continue to reach your arms overhead with fingers spread wide. Keep the movement smooth.
Nicely done with the fist and squeezing shoulder blades. Remember to breathe in as you engage your muscles.
Excellent extension overhead and exhale. Focus on fully relaxing your shoulders and arms.
You've finished the second repetition. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and fingers are open.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and to squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist. Continue focusing on your breathing with each movement.
